Articles.Content:
Pirates being the jolly-cutthroat-plundering-barbarian kind, not those ruthless-copyright-infinging kinds, arrrg.

I well very well incline to use this thread as my own private self-worship temple. But for all your well beings, i won't.

For now.

Relax, it took longer to upload then to make.

When i'm not making crudely drawn pictures of me among my various stacks of money i am off modeling (The less interesting kind) some bizarre object (I'm actually working on a few for this very game )

Long time orbiter player, so i feel the dynamics of this game come off as a little too easy. (I actually got past the learning curve, that gives me the right to call every other game too easy ;P)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Arrr matey, hop aboard the SS Black Pearl wit' ye Capt'n and you be doin' just fine.

Try out me Pirate Pack for the best lookin', plunder plunderin' ships around!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
